description: If you know much about Cody Cummings, you know he's extremely appreciative of his fans.  He feels he can't even express how grateful he is to be privileged with such loyalty and devotion.  That's why he's back to give out more thanks to a certain someone who sent him an awesome Texas sweatshirt.  Join Cody as he changes the mood from gratitude to gratification when he strips off his new gear and gets down to what he does best.  Watch Cody stroke his cock in room where sunlight is trickling in, dancing off the contours of his incredibly chiseled body.  Cody is putting on an extra sexy, very special show for you personally, giving thanks every stroke of the way.  So get in the mood for sensuous relaxation and build, as Cody does, into an explosion of warmth and jubilant thanks.Enjoy!
title: Lone Star
